ygData.subject: Re: Newbie bard stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is easy enough to test folks.  Make one character, time how long it takes to run between two points.  Make another character, dump all the bonus
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 8 Jul 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:

> That's what I thought too, but my barbarian friend, and gnomes for that
> matter are so slow I have to walk with Accel when grouped in order to not
> leave them behind. Also my ranger friend always outruns me because his
> agility is 132 with buff. I can lead with him behind and he never drops
> from accelerando range and his computer, graphics card, connection, etc are
> all slower than mine.

This is easy enough to test folks. Make one character, time
how long it takes to run between two points. Make another
character, dump all the bonus points into agility, time how
long it takes to run between the same points. I'll try it
over the weekend.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
